Welcome to my public GitHub space‚Äîwhere **industry experience** meets the **academic rigor**.

**Short Bio:** Computer Science Researcher with significant industry experience, involvement in higher education environments, and working for government agents (10y+). For more information about my work, check the pinned repositories!

## üë®‚Äçüíª Short Bio:
I'm a **Computer Science Researcher** with over 15+ years of experience across **academia**, **government projects**, and **industry**, including recent work with **[Bosch Research](https://www.bosch-ai.com/)**. My expertise spans **Neuro-Symbolic AI**, **Knowledge Graphs**, and **Distributed Computing**. For an in-depth look at my work, dive into the **pinned repositories** below.

### üåü Highlighted Research Papers

- **Scaling Scientific Knowledge Discovery with Neuro-Symbolic AI and Large Language Models** - [REPO](https://github.com/d1egoprog/KG-SLR4LLM) - [LINK](https://ceur-ws.org/Vol-3759/workshop4.pdf)
- **Enhancing downstream tasks in Knowledge Graphs Embeddings: A Complement Graph-based Approach Applied to Bilateral Trade** - [REPO](https://github.com/d1egoprog/SyntheticTriples) - [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.procs.2023.10.364)
- **FAIR Knowledge Graph construction from text, an approach applied to fictional novels** - [REPO](https://github.com/d1egoprog/Text2KG) - [LINK](http://ceur-ws.org/Vol-3184/TEXT2KG_Paper_7.pdf)
